detail_desc: V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Round-necked jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille yarn with a velvety-smooth finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, a padded, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets with a press-stud, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather covered in glittery sequins with a patent trim around the opening and a decorative patent bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a square, scallop-edged neckline front and back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a scalloped edge at the hem. Partly lined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, boxy cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with a V-neck, rhinestone-decorated buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut tops in cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline, a print motif and long sleeves.

Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and cut-out sections at the bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.
Short, wide coat in supersoft pile with notch lapels, buttons down the front and large patch pockets. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Calf-length dress in spotted mesh with beaded and sequined embroidery at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with flounced, raw-edge trims, an elasticated seam at the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Mules with pointed toes and a short slit at the front. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted, long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shoulder seams with a frill trim, long sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam, and elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a seam at the hips. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fully lined, smocked bikini bottoms with a high waist, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and adjustable hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Fitted vest top in jersey crêpe with zigzag seams around the neckline and armholes.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and sewn-in pin-tucks on the legs.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a button at the top and a floral lining.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short, wide cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons with loop fasteners down the front, and long sleeves. Narrow ribbing with a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Marled sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Seamless.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, a yoke at the back, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a scalloped hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Hole-patterned trims at the neckline and down the front and back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Super push-up bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with wide smocking at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Set with a top and boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey. Top with a racer back and elasticated hem. Briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Wide jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a print motif and a studded appliqué on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neckline, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Velvet-covered Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a collar in a broderie anglaise weave. Short puff sleeves, a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and press-studs at the crotch.
Dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter approx. 4.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft pattern knit with hole-knit sections, long, wide sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted lace top with a scallop-edge V-neck front and back, yoke and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Short trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with decorative shoulder tabs, a small stand-up collar and draped lapels. Side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim at the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a flounce at the hem.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.

Sleeveless romper suit in ribbed jersey made from a soft organic cotton blend with buttons on the shoulders and an open chest pocket with a small appliqué. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with butterfly sleeves and covered buttons down the front.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and sparkly stone buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the shoulders, long cuffed sleeves and ties at the hem.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric. Wide fit with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Shoulder bag in leather with suede details. Flap with a metal snap lock, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx 8x17x23 cm.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey. Round, picot-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with a picot trim.
Padded Alice band in fabric with rhinestone and beaded appliqués at the top.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with wide ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, fake side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Gentle push-up.

Sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with and elasticated waistband with a drawstring. Fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
